DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to test how vinflunine interacts with ixabepilone in the human body.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Alternative Administration of Ixabepilone and Vinflunine
DOC.criteria: ECOG status of 01 Inability to tolerate venous access Brain mets Severe nerve damage ANC <2,000/mm3 Platelets <100K Bilirubin >= 1.5 times the IULN ALT/AST >= 2.5 times the IULN Creatinine <50 mL/min Prior treatment with vinflunine and/or ixabepilone Strong use of CYPP450 drugs
